fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, you may kill two players you've whispered to on any previous day. If you kill your target, your name is revealed to other visitors of your victim unless you are Hunting.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Appears innocent
- When an evil or neutral player is hanged, you begin to Hunt. While Hunting, your visits are astral, you can choose to send anonymous whispers, and you appear Suspicious.
- When a good player is hanged, you are taken out of Hunting form and return to being a normal human.
- If you are roleblocked, you kill and clean your roleblocker.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__
